item.title: How to add a home teleport
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

i have a client.java but mien is mostly blank so its hard to find anything like whhat yours shwos or you say. can you post your client.java here and i wil copy and paste[quote=“tannerj55, post:10, topic:357690”][quote author=aces610 link=topic=454203.msg3326405#msg3326405 date=1283133590]
this could be a large factor i have been doing this s source is this suppose to be in client?[quote author=tannerj55 link=topic=454203.msg3326403#msg3326403 date=1283133481]
OK…
Open up Client.java.
Go to edit -> Find (CRTL-F)
In the box type:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase

Scroll down until you see the last on in client.java.
Post the code DIRECTLY under it.

Compile, Run server and type ::home, and it should teleport you to the COORDs.
[/quote]
[/quote]

It is in the source folder.
If you do not have a client.java, then I don’t know how to do it.

Tell me if this helps a little.

10gxt3s.jpg770×704
[/quote]

Read full topic

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase

Scroll down until you see the last on in client.java.

teleportToX = 3223;
teleportToY = 3219;
sendMessage(“ou teleport home.”);

like this
[/quote]

("ou teleport home.");

Put a Y in it

Other then that yes
Tell me if you have any errors.[/quote]
